name: Hubble Garble
description:
Hubble Garble is a 30 second two player game made for Duplicade.

  • Player 1 uses WASD & Space
  • Player 2 uses Arrow keys & Enter

Scoring

  • Shooting a bubble = 1
  • Hitting the core with an empty bubble = 25
  • Hittin the core with a full bubble = 100
  • A full bubble touches the player = Score halved

Secret tip: Speed up or stop your bubbles by pressing right or left.
